uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.editors.mail

Interface MessageHandlerFactory

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Contexed, Tagged
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    MessageCreator
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractMessageHandlerFactory

    public interface MessageHandlerFactory
extends Contexed, Tagged
    Interface for Factory classes that can locate MessageHandler objects via an integer index. This interface is used to allow EmailTransitionProvider to handle Messages that come from different locations. so it is classes that implement this interface that need to be configured in the java properties.
    Author:
    spb
     

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MessageHandler getHandler(int id, SessionService<?> user)
      Locate a MessageHandler by id number This method also does access control.

      • Methods inherited from interface uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.Tagged

        getTag

      • Methods inherited from interface uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.Contexed

    • Method Detail

      • getHandler

        MessageHandler getHandler(int id,
                        SessionService<?> user)
        Locate a MessageHandler by id number This method also does access control. If the user only has read permission a simple MessageHandler should be returned. If the user has edit permission a MessageComposer should be returned. Otherwise this method returns null.
        Parameters:
        id - integer identifier for MessageComposers from this Factory
        user - AppUSer making request
        Returns:
        MessageHandler or MessageComposer or null
